text: The BBC Elstree Centre, sometimes referred to as the BBC Elstree Studios, is a place where television is made. It is currently owned by the BBC. The Elstree Centre is located between Eldon Avenue and Clarendon Road in Borehamwood, Hertfordshire, England. It is currently a main base for BBC Television. The television studios being run by the BBC's commercial subsidiary BBC Studioworks, previously known as BBC Studios and Post Production.Charlotte Forde. "Our services - Studios - Brand new studios at Elstree". BBCStudiosAndPostProduction.com. BBC Studios and Post Production. Archived from the original on 14 October 2013. title: BBC Elstree Centre
